title: 4Bd 3Ba Spacious home for rent!
posting_body: This stately home has 4 furnished bedrooms, 3 baths and well-appointed kitchen allow you to set up home from the day you move in.
The home boasts of a backyard paradise; a place where you can take all your parties in warmer weather.
